content.rendered:
FAQ'S

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Techlife Finance?

Techlife Finance is a smart, high-frequency and algorithmic trading platform. Our system is designed to make just a tiny profit on each transaction, but through sheer speed and volume, we generate large returns. Hence, we don’t risk a lot but we do profit a lot. You can learn more in the About us section.

Is techlifefinance.com a registered and legal company?

Yes, techlifefinance.com is registered in the Penetanguishene, Ontario, Canada as “techlifefinance.com” with the following registration number: #11432443

Who can become our client?

ny individual who has reached the legal age can become a client of techlifefinance.com. You do not require any special knowledge about the investment market to use our services.

How can I open my techlifefinance.com account?

To become our client you will need to fill out the registration form with all the required information and accept our terms of service. The registration form is located here.

May I open several accounts in your program?

No, only one account per physical person is allowed. If there are multiple persons who are living in the same household their accounts must not be referred to each other. If this rule is violated all involved accounts will be blocked without an option to refund the involved funds.

How do I invest?

After authorization you have to log in and navigate to the deposit page. There you will be presented with the deposit form. Enter the deposit amount and click on “Deposit”. The payment details will be generated and you will have to complete the payment form your chosen wallet.

How much can I invest?

You can make a deposit starting from just $100 and there are no maximum limits.

How may deposits can I have simultaneously?

The deposit count is not limited. Each of your deposits is treated individually and has its own profit accrual times.

How long is the investment duration?

The 4% hourly investment package has an unlimited investment duration. For the other packages, accruals are calculated hourly or daily until the plan is finished. This means you can withdraw your accruals either hourly or daily, according to the plan you’ve chosen. The minimum investment period is 10 hours.

When will my deposit be activated?

Your deposit will be activated after the transaction has at least 1 confirmation. This process usually takes from 10 minutes to 2 hours. You can read more information here: http://bitcoinsimplified.org/learn-more/confirmations

What if after confirmation my deposit is still not active?

In such case, please send us a message from our contact page or via support@techlifefinance.com Include the following data: 1) Your username 2) The exact amount of the deposit in BitCoin 3) The address, to which the payment was sent 4) The transaction ID/Hash (TXID)

When will the first profit be generated?

Profit accruals are generated on an hourly or daily basis, the first accrual can be available after 1 hour from the moment your deposit is activated.

Do I get profit everyday, even on weekends?

Yes, of course. It is generated on an ongoing basis, 7 days a week.

Do you offer compounding?

No we do not offer this option.

Can I redeposit from my Account balance?

No we do not offer this option.

When will I get my deposit back?

The deposit is included in the percentage of the package you have chosen.

What payment processors do you accept?

Bitcoin, Ethereum, and USDT

Where can I buy bitcoin?

You can find some of the most popular cryptocurrency sellers here: https://howtobuybitcoins.info

How can I check my balance?

You can access the account information 24 hours, seven days a week over the Internet.

How do I change my e-mail address?

You must contact our support and we will resolve this issue.

How can I change my password?

You can change your password from your Dashboard by navigating to the Account Settings.

How do I change my wallet address?

You can change your BitCoin wallet address from your Dashboard by navigating to the Account Settings.

I can't access my account! What do I do?

Check the login data: your username and password. If you have lost your password use the password reset function, which is located below the login form. Click on the Forgot Password link, type your E-Mail and you’ll receive instructions in your E-Mail on how to reset your password.

How can I withdraw my funds?

Access your personal account using your username and password and click on the Withdraw Funds button. After that you will be presented with the withdraw request form.

What is the minimum amount I can withdraw?

You can create a request for withdrawal of any amount that is equal to or greater than $10

After I make a withdrawal, when will my account be credited?

All payment processing is fully automated, which means that you will get paid immediately after creating your query.

Do you charge any withdrawal fees?

No, our clients do not have to bear any fees while withdrawing their funds.

I made a withdrawal request, but it's pending! What do I do?

The most likely cause of the payment delay is an invalid Bitcoin address. If the payment has an error it needs to be checked manually and this process may take up to 24 hours.

My withdrawal is processed, but the funds are not in my wallet, why?

All cryptocurrency transactions are processed after the network confirmation. Just wait a little bit.

What is my referral commission?

techlifefinance.com offers a referral commission of 6% from every deposit that your “Direct” referrals make, 3% from every deposit from 2 tier level and 1% from 3rd tier levels.

Do I have to make my own deposit to receive referral commissions?

To use your affiliate link and to receive referral commissions, it is not necessary to have your own active deposit.

I am not receiving emails from the company, why?

Check the spam folder in your mailbox. If the problem is not solved, contact your email provider. We strongly recommend that you use trusted services like @gmail.com to work with our website.

How can I contact support in case of any problem?

You can contact us around the clock via the telegram or email support@techlifefinance.com – We will promptly respond to any problems.
